company_command.name: Company Command
company_command.description: A higher-ranking field officer trained to command more units and occasionally direct field operations.

platoon_command.name: Platoon Command
platoon_command.description: A lower-ranking platoon commander to provide support to other field units.

platoon_command_veteran.name: Veteran Platoon Command
platoon_command_veteran.description: A lower-ranking platoon commander to provide support to other field units.

forward_artillery_observer.name: Forward Artillery Observer
forward_artillery_observer.description: An artillery forward observer able to call in a fire mission.

field_medic.name: Field Medic
field_medic.description: A trained field medic used to treat the wounded near the frontline.

puppet_chinese.name: Chinese Collaborationists
puppet_chinese.description: Close to 600,000 Chinese soldiers served under the banner of the 'Reorganized National Government of the Republic of China' or 'Wang Jingwei regime'. Wang Jingwei was a man who believed he would've become the true leader of the Nationalist Revolutionary Party and thus, China, but Generalissimo Chiang Kai-shek had risen to power faster. The Wang Jingwei regime flew the twin banners of the Nationalist Party and 'Five Races Under One Union' flag, with the hopes people would believe it to be the true, legitimate regime of China. Unfortunately for Wang Jingwei, his regime was and appeared to be subordinate to the will of Japan.

paratrooper_squad.name: "Teshin Shudan" Paratrooper Squad
paratrooper_squad.description: A group of trained japanese special forces.

veteran_paratrooper_squad.name: Veteran "Teshin Shudan" Paratrooper Squad
veteran_paratrooper_squad.description: A group of veteran japanese Airborne.

snlf_squad.name: SNLF Squad
snlf_squad.description: A group of trained japanese special forces.

snlf_grenadiers.name: SNLF Grenadier Squad
snlf_grenadiers.description: A group of trained japanese special forces.

combat_engineers.name: Combat Engineers
combat_engineers.description: A squad of japanese combat engineers.

flamethrower_team.name: Flamethrower Team
flamethrower_team.description: A team equipped to clear bunkers and other defensive positions.

suicide_anti_tank_team.name: Suicide Anti-Tank Team
suicide_anti_tank_team.description: A team dedicated to hunting tanks with hand-held anti-tank weapons.

tank_hunters.name: Tank Hunters
tank_hunters.description: A team dedicated to hunting tanks with hand-held anti-tank weapons.

at_rifle_team.name: AT Rifle Team
at_rifle_team.description: A team dedicated to hunting lighter tanks.

marksman.name: Marksman
marksman.description: A lone marksman equipped with a marksman rifle.

type_4.name: Type 4 AT Team
type_4.description: A team dedicated to hunting heavy tanks.

light_mortar_team.name: Light Mortar Team
light_mortar_team.description: A light mortar carried by a small team.

medium_mortar_team.name: Medium Mortar Team
medium_mortar_team.description: A medium mortar carried by a small team.

heavy_mortar_team.name: Heavy Mortar Team
heavy_mortar_team.description: A heavy mortar carried by a small team.

type_92_tankette.name: Type 92 Tankette
type_92_tankette.description: A very light tank with some infantry support weaponry.

type_94_tankette.name: Type 94 Tankette
type_94_tankette.description: A very light infantry support tank.

type_97_te_ke.name: Type 97 Te-Ke
type_97_te_ke.description: A very light infantry support tank.

type_95_ha_go.name: Type 95 Ha-Go
type_95_ha_go.description: A very light tank for infantry support.

type_98_ke_ni.name: Type 98 Ke-Ni
type_98_ke_ni.description: A light tank with decent anti-tank ability.

type_2_ke_to.name: Type 2 Ke-To
type_2_ke_to.description: A light tank with decent anti-tank ability.

type_4_ke_nu_type_89.name: Type 4 Ke-Nu, Type 89 Yi-Go, Type 97 Chi-Ha
type_4_ke_nu_type_89.description: A light tank with an infantry support howitzer.

models.name: Type 4 Ke-Nu, Type 89 Yi-Go, Type 97 Chi-Ha

type_97_kai_shinhoto.name: Type 97-Kai Shinhoto
type_97_kai_shinhoto.description: A lighter tank with an adequate anti-tank gun.

type_2_ho_i.name: Type 2 Ho-I
type_2_ho_i.description: A medium tank for infantry support.

type_2_ka_mi.name: Type 2 Ka-Mi
type_2_ka_mi.description: An amphibious light tank for naval assaults.

type_3_ka_chi.name: Type 3 Ka-Chi
type_3_ka_chi.description: An amphibious medium tank for naval assaults.

type_4_ho_ro.name: Type 4 Ho-Ro
type_4_ho_ro.description: An amphibious medium tank for naval assaults.

captured_m3_stuart.name: Captured M3 Stuart
captured_m3_stuart.description: A medium tank with a decent all-round AT gun.

captured_m4_sherman.name: Captured M4 Sherman
captured_m4_sherman.description: A medium tank with a decent all-round AT gun.

banzai_charge.name: Banzai Charge
banzai_charge.flavor: A swift and deadly end to a fight can come with a furious charge...
banzai_charge.description: Use when a Japanese _Infantry_ unit declares a Charge action. It gets +3" of Movement for that action.

stealth_tactics.name: Jungle Experts
stealth_tactics.flavor: Moving quickly and quietly, Japanese infantry can outmaneuver their enemies.
stealth_tactics.description: Use when activating an _Infantry_ unit. It may make a free Move action and may not be targeted by reaction fire when doing so.

tough_fighters.name: Tough Fighters
tough_fighters.flavor: Some of the toughest units to fight in a close combat.
tough_fighters.description: Use before an _Infantry_ unit uses a fight action. Its attacks gain +1 Strength.

natural_leader.name: Natural Leader
natural_leader.description: This unit and friendly _Infantry_ units within 6" get +1 Courage and +1 Initiative.

defensive_fire.name: Defensive Fire
defensive_fire.description: This unit and friendly _Infantry_ units within 6" get +1 Accuracy when using an Ambush reaction.

move_it.name: Move It
move_it.description: When this unit is activated, this unit and friendly _Infantry_ units within 6" may immediately remove one shock.

mobile_expert.name: Mobile Expert
mobile_expert.description: This unit may move and fire assault weapons without suffering the -1 to hit penalty.

ambush_tactics.name: Ambush Tactics
ambush_tactics.description: This unit and one other friendly _Infantry_ unit may be placed in hidden deployment instead of deployed on the field. See the section for hidden units in the core rules for details on how hidden units work.
